There are several common words I detest. 
 
 fruit cup
 fruit bowl
 cracker
 cookie
 product
 
 
 I don't no why I detest them I just get set on edge when someone says them.
 
 Any common words that you detest or that set you on edge?

 Any common words that you detest or that set you on edge?

 
 Dependent upon their use: 
 
 gay
 like
 szuszh
 
 There are a few non-words which bug me mainly because they're used all too often, either written or spoken:
 
 alot (written...this is TWO words NOT one!)
 irregardless (either, the problem being it simply doesn't exist!)
 towards (another non-existent word, there is no "s" in toward nor should one ever be used)
 
 Then there are the spelling pet peeves:
 
 There
 Their 
 &
 They're 
 
 Three different words with three different usages. It grates on my nerves when people don't know the difference and seemingly don't care enough to bother using them properly. 
 This also goes for: 
 
 are 
 &
 our
 
 & 
 
 ur
 
 ACK!!!
